h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Gore-Eye Daoist
content: To the left, you can find a path leading to a grotto and a familiar face, the Wise Master who imbued your gourd with the power to absorb Spirits.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellow_Sand_Formation_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Yellow Sand Formation Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Windseal Gate' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Gore-Eye Daoist'.
The content is as follows:
To the left, you can find a path leading to a grotto and a familiar face, the Wise Master who imbued your gourd with the power to absorb Spirits.
